Editorial: NCEA results don’t have to leave you stuck with a couch https://www.nzherald.co.nz/stratford-press/news/editorial-ncea-results-dont-have-to-leave-you-stuck-with-a-couch/UEGNMAXVKFHXBCVDL4WHOJUAKU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/stratford-press/news/editorial-ncea-results-dont-have-to-leave-you-stuck-with-a-couch/UEGNMAXVKFHXBCVDL4WHOJUAKU/ Ilona HanneOPINION: Just like Ross from Friends, we all need to learn to pivot at times Tue, 16 Jan 2024 17:00:00 +0000 While the actual episode of Friends this scene appears in is officially called "The One with the Cop", to many it is known simply as Pivot - a word that doesn't have to mean you are stuck on the stairs with a couch, writes Ilona Hanne.
